title: The Portuguese Embassy
description: The Portuguese Embassy; Master of the Soane Josephus (Flemish, active about 1475 - 1485); Bruges, Belgium; about 1480 - 1483; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 48 × 35 cm (18 7/8 × 13 3/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 7, fol. 112; J.
